# Nelexa\GPlay\Exception\GooglePlayException::__construct
`Nelexa\GPlay\Exception\GooglePlayException::__construct` â€” Construct the GooglePlayException.

## Description
```php
Nelexa\GPlay\Exception\GooglePlayException::__construct ( [ string $message = "" ] [, int $code = 0 ] [, Throwable $previous = null ] )
```

## Parameters
* **$message** (string)  
the Exception message to throw
* **$code** (int)  
the Exception code
* **$previous** (Throwable)  
the previous throwable used for the exception chaining

## Return Values
No value is returned.
